Name: Race Project
About the game: Are you ready for action and racing fun? Because that is exactly what you get here. You can set best times or even compete with your teammates. But if you loose the desire to race, you can also prove yourself in the two other modes. In short, you will only win in Destruction Derby or Demolition Derby as the last survivor. The Destruction Derby and Demolition Derby differ enormously. In Destruction Derby, also known as DD, you basically only have to try to be the last survivor to win without other support. Demolition Derby is different, because it is a parkour to drive to reach a military vehicle at the end of the track. Features Multiplayer (1 - 16 players) - Whether you want to set the best times on your own or want to try out new DD / DM routes, everything is possible. Prove yourself - Try to becoming the best racing driver Multiple pickups. - From nitroboost and repairkits to vehicle changes in the race. Map Editor - Fully customizable maps and all necessary assets provided. You have the opportunity to create your own maps and share them with the commnity. Dedicated server - For everyone who wants to play on a persistent server. Choose the maps and gamemodes you like and play with your friends. Survive, win and live to tell the story!
